entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 9:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
